message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $115.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $105 is too low for me. Could you do $110?
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Could you meet me at $108? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'm not sure I can go any higher.
